org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.demo.bluetooth

Class ChooseDeviceFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.bluetooth.ui.BluetoothDevicesFragment
        • org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.demo.bluetooth.ChooseDeviceFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, BluetoothDeviceListAdapter.OnItemClickListener

    public class ChooseDeviceFragment
extends BluetoothDevicesFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass. Activities that contain this fragment must implement the OnPairDevice interface to handle interaction events. Use the ChooseDeviceFragment#newInstance factory method to create an instance of this fragment.
